snippet.title: Is Obama's biggest problem...Obama?
snippet.description: So long as Republicans have a say in Congress, Obama's biggest impediment to passing his agenda might be...himself.

snippet.title: 'It's Even Worse Than It Looks: How the American Constitutional System Collided With The New Politics of Extremism' by Thomas E. Mann and Norman J. Ornstein
snippet.description: In "It's Even Worse Than It Looks: How the American Constitutional System Collided With The New Politics of Extremism," Thomas E. Mann and Norman J. Ornstein argue that the American system of government is imperiled by Republican politics.

snippet.title: In 'Long Day's Journey' at Arena, there's something special about this Mary
snippet.description: The enveloping gloom of Arena Stage's "Long Day's Journey Into Night" unquestionably swirls around Helen Carey's Mary Tyrone.

snippet.title: In documentary 'Pina,' a physical examination of choreographer's legacy
snippet.description: Wim Wenders's 3-D film tribute to Pina Bausch, one of the most influential theater and dance minds in modern history, is a multisensory merry-goIn the 3-D documentary 'Pina,' the Pina Bausch Company dancers are rarely filmed in a theater, adding to its surreal tone.-round.

snippet.title: Countdown to death
snippet.description: Isn't any level of doubt enough?

snippet.title: Car camera keeps eye on teen drivers
snippet.description: IMPERIAL, MO. - Tyler Suter is a teenager most any parent would be proud to have.

snippet.title: Car camera keeps eye on teen drivers
snippet.description: IMPERIAL, MO. - Tyler Suter is a teenager most any parent would be proud to have.

snippet.title: Carolyn Hax Live: Can I date my child's teacher?, Playing favorites, Getting my kid to play sports, How can I host Thanksgiving sanely?, Being Mr. Mom, Long story short, and more
snippet.description: Carolyn Hax takes your questions and comments about her columns and any other questions you might have about the strange train we call life.

snippet.title: To beam, or not to beam? Offbeat Shakespeare troupe performs the Bard in Klingon.
snippet.description: Don't you love that remarkable moment when roSenQatlh and ghIlDenSten exit the stage and Khamlet is left alone to deliver the immortal words: "baQa', Qovpatlh, toy'wl"a' qal je jIH"?
